1.title: Curiosity and Adaptability
1.body: Reflects imagination and interest in novelty. High openness means creativity, while lower levels favor practical thinking and familiarity.

2.title: Responsibility and Dependability
2.body: Indicates organization and discipline. High levels suggest careful planning, while lower levels bring flexibility and spontaneity.

3.title: Sociability and Assertiveness
3.body: Relates to energy in social settings. High extraversion implies enthusiasm for group activities, while lower levels favor independence and reflection.

4.title: Cooperativeness and Compassion
4.body: Shows warmth and kindness. High agreeableness supports harmony, while lower levels enable self-reliance and assertiveness.

5.title: Emotional Resilience
5.body: Measures emotional sensitivity. Higher levels can enhance self-awareness, while lower levels reflect calmness and stability.
